featured.text: From the late 1850s until his death in 1910, Winslow Homer produced a body of work distinguished by its thoughtful expression and its independence from artistic conventions.
A man of multiple talents, Homer excelled equally in the arts of illustration, oil painting, and watercolor.
Which of the following is true about Homer’s career?
Homer was assigned to cover the inauguration of President Lincoln and, later, the Civil War.

other.text: Homer moved to England and, after a two-year stay, returned to America.
According to the passage, which of the following best characterizes Homer’s art? (A)

definition.zh_def: 古希臘詩人，著作包括《伊利亞特》和《奧德賽》。
definition.en_def: An ancient Greek poet traditionally said to be the author of the epic poems 'Iliad' and 'Odyssey'.
definition.example: Homer's works have had a profound influence on Western literature.
